data.title: Home — Atlas Restaurant Group
data.meta_description: With an uncompromising effort to deliver authentic cuisine from around the world, Atlas Restaurant Group is a lifestyle hospitality group that focuses on the integrity of product, impeccable service and an unparalleled entertainment experience that has redefined the traditional dining experience.
data.text:
Redefining

culinary culture.

With an expanding roster of concepts and cuisines, the common thread among Atlas properties is the integrity of product sourced from around the world.

Motivated to Amaze.

With an uncompromising effort to deliver authentic cuisine from around the world, Atlas Restaurant Group is a lifestyle hospitality group that focuses on the integrity of product, impeccable service and an unparalleled entertainment experience that has redefined the traditional dining experience.

Unforgettable experiences.

Gift Cards

Give the gift of world-class cuisine and flawless service with an Atlas gift card!

Private Events

From intimate receptions and dinners to larger celebrations and parties, we have the perfect location with personalized service and world-class cuisine in an elegant setting.

The Atlas App

Introducing the new Atlas mobile app featuring a Rewards Program where points are earned for every dollar you spend!

Every menu, every meal.

Fish flown in from Japan’s famous fish market.

The area’s largest oyster program.

The state’s most impressive whiskey list.

The region’s most extensive wine list.

Each and every one of our properties offers something unique, and we’re just getting started.

Located next door to Loch Bar in the bustling River Oaks District, Atlas Restaurant Group will open their second location...

Over 350 wine selections complement hand-rolled, house-made Italian classics.

Atlas Restaurant Group’s much-anticipated steakhouse opening in Baltimore’s Harbor East neighborhood will be called The Ruxton. This 200-seat classic American...

Relax and enjoy the real deal in Greek cuisine without booking a flight.

French brasserie throwback to when culture boomed and extravagance flourished.

Exciting flavors and flair, inspired by South American cuisines with a Mexican focus.

We’re never just opening restaurants. We’re dedicating ourselves to the enrichment of every city and neighborhood that welcomes us.

Learn about out our efforts in communities across the country.
